verses.verse: In the third <WH7992> month <WH2320>, when the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> were gone forth <WH3318> <WH8800> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, the same day <WH3117> came <WH935> <WH8804> they into the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai <WH5514>.

For they were departed <WH5265> <WH8799> from Rephidim <WH7508>, and were come <WH935> <WH8799> to the desert <WH4057> of Sinai <WH5514>, and had pitched <WH2583> <WH8799> in the wilderness <WH4057>; and there Yisra'EL <WH3478> camped <WH2583> <WH8799> before the mount <WH2022>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> went up <WH5927> <WH8804> unto 'Elohim <WH430>, and the YY <WH3068> called <WH7121> <WH8799> unto him out of the mountain <WH2022>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Thus shalt thou say <WH559> <WH8799> to the house <WH1004> of Ya`akov <WH3290>, and tell <WH5046> <WH8686> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>;

Ye have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> what I did <WH6213> <WH8804> unto the Egyptians <WH4714>, and how I bare <WH5375> <WH8799> you on eagles <WH5404> ' wings <WH3671>, and brought <WH935> <WH8686> you unto myself.

Now therefore, if ye will obey <WH8085> <WH8799> my voice <WH6963> indeed <WH8085> <WH8800>, and keep <WH8104> <WH8804> my covenant <WH1285>, then ye shall be a peculiar treasure <WH5459> unto me above all people <WH5971>: for all the earth <WH776> is mine:

And ye shall be unto me a kingdom <WH4467> of Kohanim <WH3548>, and an holy <WH6918> nation <WH1471>. These are the words <WH1697> which thou shalt speak <WH1696> <WH8762> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> came <WH935> <WH8799> and called <WH7121> <WH8799> for the elders <WH2205> of the people <WH5971>, and laid <WH7760> <WH8799> before their faces <WH6440> all these words <WH1697> which the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> him.

And all the people <WH5971> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> together <WH3162>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, All that the YY <WH3068> hath spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> we will do <WH6213> <WH8799>. And Mosheh <WH4872> returned <WH7725> <WH8686> the words <WH1697> of the people <WH5971> unto the YY <WH3068>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Lo, I come <WH935> <WH8802> unto thee in a thick <WH5645> cloud <WH6051>, that the people <WH5971> may hear <WH8085> <WH8799> when I speak <WH1696> <WH8763> with thee, and believe <WH539> <WH8686> thee for ever <WH5769>. And Mosheh <WH4872> told <WH5046> <WH8686> the words <WH1697> of the people <WH5971> unto the YY <WH3068>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Go <WH3212> <WH8798> unto the people <WH5971>, and sanctify <WH6942> <WH8765> them to day <WH3117> and to morrow <WH4279>, and let them wash <WH3526> <WH8765> their clothes <WH8071>,

And be ready <WH3559> <WH8737> against the third <WH7992> day <WH3117>: for the third <WH7992> day <WH3117> the YY <WH3068> will come down <WH3381> <WH8799> in the sight <WH5869> of all the people <WH5971> upon mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514>.

And thou shalt set bounds <WH1379> <WH8689> unto the people <WH5971> round about <WH5439>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Take heed <WH8104> <WH8734> to yourselves, that ye go not up <WH5927> <WH8800> into the mount <WH2022>, or touch <WH5060> <WH8800> the border <WH7097> of it: whosoever toucheth <WH5060> <WH8802> the mount <WH2022> shall be surely <WH4191> <WH8800> put to death <WH4191> <WH8714>:

There shall not an hand <WH3027> touch <WH5060> <WH8799> it, but he shall surely <WH5619> <WH8800> be stoned <WH5619> <WH8735>, or <WH176> shot <WH3384> <WH8735> through <WH3384> <WH8800>; whether it be beast <WH929> or <WH518> man <WH376>, it shall not live <WH2421> <WH8799>: when the shofar <WH3104> soundeth long <WH4900> <WH8800>, they shall come up <WH5927> <WH8799> to the mount <WH2022>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> went down <WH3381> <WH8799> from the mount <WH2022> unto the people <WH5971>, and sanctified <WH6942> <WH8762> the people <WH5971>; and they washed <WH3526> <WH8762> their clothes <WH8071>.
And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the people <WH5971>, Be <WH1961> <WH8798> ready <WH3559> <WH8737> against the third <WH7969> day <WH3117>: come <WH5066> <WH8799> not at your wives <WH802>.

And it came to pass on the third <WH7992> day <WH3117> in the morning <WH1242>, that there were thunders <WH6963> and lightnings <WH1300>, and a thick <WH3515> cloud <WH6051> upon the mount <WH2022>, and the voice <WH6963> of the shofar <WH7782> exceeding <WH3966> loud <WH2389>; so that all the people <WH5971> that was in the camp <WH4264> trembled <WH2729> <WH8799>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> brought forth <WH3318> <WH8686> the people <WH5971> out of the camp <WH4264> to meet <WH7125> <WH8800> with 'Elohim <WH430>; and they stood <WH3320> <WH8691> at the nether <WH8482> part of the mount <WH2022>.

And mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514> was altogether on a smoke <WH6225> <WH8804>, because <WH6440> <WH834> the YY <WH3068> descended <WH3381> <WH8804> upon it in fire <WH784>: and the smoke <WH6227> thereof ascended <WH5927> <WH8799> as the smoke <WH6227> of a furnace <WH3536>, and the whole mount <WH2022> quaked <WH2729> <WH8799> greatly <WH3966>.

And when the voice <WH6963> of the shofar <WH7782> sounded <WH6963> long <WH1980> <WH8802>, and waxed louder <WH2390> and louder <WH3966>, Mosheh <WH4872> spake <WH1696> <WH8762>, and 'Elohim <WH430> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> him by a voice <WH6963>.

And the YY <WH3068> came down <WH3381> <WH8799> upon mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514>, on the top <WH7218> of the mount <WH2022>: and the YY <WH3068> called <WH7121> <WH8799> Mosheh <WH4872> up to <WH413> the top <WH7218> of the mount <WH2022>; and Mosheh <WH4872> went up <WH5927> <WH8799>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Go down <WH3381> <WH8798>, charge <WH5749> <WH8685> the people <WH5971>, lest they break through <WH2040> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068> to gaze <WH7200> <WH8800>, and many <WH7227> of them perish <WH5307> <WH8804>.
And let the Kohanim <WH3548> also, which come near <WH5066> <WH8737> to the YY <WH3068>, sanctify <WH6942> <WH8691> themselves, lest the YY <WH3068> break forth <WH6555> <WH8799> upon them.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>, The people <WH5971> cannot <WH3201> <WH8799> come up <WH5927> <WH8800> to mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514>: for thou chargedst <WH5749> <WH8689> us, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Set bounds <WH1379> <WH8685> about the mount <WH2022>, and sanctify <WH6942> <WH8765> it.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Away <WH3212> <WH8798>, get thee down <WH3381> <WH8798>, and thou shalt come up <WH5927> <WH8804>, thou, and Aharon <WH175> with thee: but let not the Kohanim <WH3548> and the people <WH5971> break through <WH2040> <WH8799> to come up <WH5927> <WH8800> unto the YY <WH3068>, lest he break forth <WH6555> <WH8799> upon them.
So Mosheh <WH4872> went down <WH3381> <WH8799> unto the people <WH5971>, and spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto them.
